title: Please!
detail_text: <:th_ch0212/>What’s with this photo? Why are you dressed like that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Oh, this? It’s the uniform for my part-time job~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Part-time job?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Yeah, I wear a maid outfit and serve customers at a café.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I see.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Do you think it’s strange?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Not really. In the States, there are diners, which have a similar concept.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>So you already know a lot about it! Do you wanna try working at a part-time job like this, Mia-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>What!? What do you mean!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Someone who already knows how it’s done would be a big help! Pleeease~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
